CSGO was my gateway to PC gaming. I picked it up for a steam sumer sale over  ayear ago and have bene hooked since. I've put almost 250 hours into it, and I still may not be all that great, but I do have to say that it's been one of the most fun games to play. Whether solo queing or queing with friends, every lobby is unique. Throughout the frustration and rage induced by this game, I can still say its the best game I've owned in a long time.
